name: The Long Table
description:
Every week in Alongame, those who live near each other gather for a 'village' supper; a popular tradition at these suppers is called The Long Table. Everyone at the table draws a question from a bowl and gives their answers in turn, without revealing the question they were asked, and in doing so creates a unique poem that could only have been written on that evening by that group.

This page is now a table, and anyone who visits is part of a 'village' having a supper. Launch the game to reveal a randomised question; write your answer as a comment below. As more people play and comment, we will have a longer and longer poem that describes the supper we're all at.
